statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants;
SELECT location_name, safety_record FROM nuclear_power_plants;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, capacity, safety_record FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants ORDER BY location_name DESC, capacity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location_name, safety_record FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT location_id, location_name, capacity FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE safety_record LIKE '%excellent%'
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT location_name, safety_record FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE location_name LIKE 'U%'
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants;
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE safety_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT location_name, inspection_date FROM nuclear_power_plants JOIN safety_records ON nuclear_power_plants.location_id = safety_records.location_id;

SELECT location_name, violation_type FROM nuclear_power_plants LEFT JOIN safety_records ON nuclear_power_plants.location_id = safety_records.location_id WHERE safety_records.inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT location_name, violation_details FROM nuclear_power_plants RIGHT JOIN safety_records ON nuclear_power_plants.location_id = safety_records.location_id WHERE safety_records.violation_type = 'Safety Hazard';
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw, safety_rating FROM nuclear_power_plants;
SELECT * FROM safety_records WHERE inspection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE safety_rating = 'High';
SELECT violation_type, violation_details FROM safety_records ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw, safety_rating, inspection_date, violation_type FROM nuclear_power_plants JOIN safety_records ON nuclear_power_plants.location_id = safety_records.location_id;
SELECT id, location_name, address, capacity_mw FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations WHERE capacity_mw > 1000;
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations ORDER BY capacity_mw DESC;
SELECT plant_id, year_installed FROM nuclear_power_plant_capacities WHERE year_installed BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT plant_id, inspection_date, safety_rating FROM nuclear_power_plant_safety_records WHERE safety_rating = 'Excellent';
SELECT location_name, capacity_mw FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_capacities WHERE year_installed > 2000 ORDER BY capacity_mw DESC;

SELECT npl.location_name, npp.year_installed, nps.inspection_date FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations npl JOIN nuclear_power_plant_capacities npp ON npl.id = npp.plant_id JOIN nuclear_power_plant_safety_records nps ON npl.id = nps.plant_id WHERE nps.safety_rating = 'Satisfactory';
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY address;

SELECT npl.location_name, nps.inspection_date AS last_inspection FROM nuclear_power_plant_locations npl JOIN nuclear_power_plant_safety_records nps ON npl.id = nps.plant_id ORDER BY last_inspection DESC;
SELECT * FROM power_plants;
SELECT id, location, safety_record FROM power_plants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT location, capacity FROM power_plants ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT name, role, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs
SELECT location, capacity FROM power_plants ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT name, role, department, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM power_plants
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE date_occurred BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_occurred
SELECT plant_id, location, capacity, safety_rating FROM nuclear_power_plants;
SELECT * FROM power_plant_employees WHERE job_title = 'Engineer';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM power_plant_employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT report_id, plant_id, report_date, safety_issue FROM plant_safety_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_id, plant_id, sensor_type, reading_time FROM plant_sensors WHERE reading > 100;
SELECT * FROM nuclear_power_plants ORDER BY location DESC, capacity ASC
SELECT location, safety_rating FROM nuclear_power_plants WHERE safety_rating = 'High'
SELECT employee_name, job_title, salary FROM power_plant_employees WHERE job_title LIKE '%Engineer%' ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT report_date, safety_issue FROM plant_safety_reports WHERE safety_issue LIKE '%emergency%' AND report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT plant_id, sensor_type, reading FROM plant_sensors ORDER BY reading DESC, reading_time ASC
